PLib::NoInitHPoint_3D Class Reference

An unitialized HPoint_3D. More...

#include <matrix/hpoint_nd.h>

Detailed Description

An unitialized HPoint_3D.

Suppose you don't want to call the default constructor for a HPoint_3D. What do you do? Well you use this class. This is only usefull in arrays and the likes.

Philippe Lavoie
